message.content: It is not possible to provide an accurate summary of what most women in Belgium think of divorce as opinions on this matter can vary greatly among individuals. Women's perspectives on divorce in Belgium, as in any other country, are influenced by various factors such as personal experiences, cultural background, education, and individual values. Some women may view divorce as a necessary step to end an unhappy or abusive marriage, while others may see it as a last resort and prefer to work on their relationship. Additionally, societal attitudes towards divorce have evolved over time, and more women in Belgium may now consider divorce as a viable option for personal growth and happiness. Ultimately, it is important to recognize that women's opinions on divorce are diverse and can differ significantly from person to person.
